Description: For sale is a 2000 Gibson Limited Edition Millennium Les Paul in a beautiful Red Sparkle with original case. This instrument is in very good condition and in perfect working order. There are some scratches, dings, tarnish to the gold hard-wear, and some wear on the back. Overall, I would give it a solid 8 out of 10 condition. Everything on the guitar is original. There are no cracks, repairs, or issues. The neck is straight with no issues. The original frets are in excellent condition with no wear. The original case has some wear and a broken combo latch, but works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.70" 1st Fret: 0.83" 12th Fret: 0.99" Neck Type: Medium Finger Board: Rosewood Pickups: Original Gibson Weight: 9lb 6oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart. I have provided tons of pictures. Please check them out. Utah residents please add 7.05% sales tax.
